content.p:
Modern Linux on SGI Altix - 02-May-2025
I recently purchased two SGI Altixes, an Altix 350 and Altix 3700. The IA64 Altix computers came with a RHEL based distro, then switched to SuSE Enterprise Linux Server (SLES). The latest officially supported is SLES 11, which I installed fine on both atlixes. SLES works ok...
